text: Arizona's 1st Legislative District is one of 30 in the state, consisting of most of Yavapai County, along with a small section of Maricopa County. As of 2020 there are 51 precincts in the district, 35 in Yavapai and 16 in Maricopa, with a total registered voter population of 156,215. ==Political representation== The district is represented for the 2018–2019 Legislative Session in the State Senate by Karen Fann (R, Prescott) and in the House of Representatives by Steve Pierce (R, Prescott) and Noel W. Campbell (R, Prescott). ==See also== * List of Arizona Legislative Districts * Arizona State Legislature ==References== Category:Arizona legislative districts Category:Yavapai County, Arizona Category:Maricopa County, Arizona
title: Arizona's 1st legislative district
